short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the thrill of speed with Audi R8 Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This sleek, high-performance sports car dominates your new tab with its stunning design and dynamic presence. Access your favorite sites quickly, customize shortcuts, and keep track of time with the built-in calendar and clock. Search the web effortlessly using your preferred engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Admire the iconic Audi R8 in all its glory.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly navigate to frequently visited websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Tailor your tab with links you use most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on schedule with an integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Conduct smooth and fast web searches.
Explore more car-themed extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily using the included links.
